name: treatment of waste x-ray film | waste x-ray film | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11453/documentation

This dataset represents treatment of spent x-ray film for silver recovery. These films have a valuable silver content. Silver recovery from x-ray film represents 75% of all silver produced from scrap in the global market. ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

Dataset starts with used x-film.

Dataset end with production of silver for recovery treatment. It includes removing of gelatine from plastic film, energy consumption and waste treatment.  Infrastructure is estimated.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: From one technology of treatment of waste x-ray film for silver recovery, using electrochemical reactor at a laboratory scale, to all x-ray film silver recovery worldwide.

flow.name: waste x-ray film
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

exchanges.description: Caculated value. Based on reported initital concentration of Ag in acid nitric solution. Acid nitric 5%v/v was used. As recovery process is an electrochemical process, two cells with electrods are used both containing nitric acid. Calculated amount of water and acids was double assuming both cells were filled equivalently.

exchanges.description: Caculated value. Based on reported initital concentration of Ag in acid nitric solution. Acid nitric 5%v/v was used. As recovery process is an electrochemical process, two cells with electrods are used both containing nitric acid. Calculated amount of water and acids was double assuming both cells were filled equivalently (17.638 kg). It also contains water contained in sodium hydroxide solution (50%) assumed to be used to neutralise waste nitric acid (0.895 kg).
